summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on June 26, 2010. The email contains a brief message wishing Staley a good vacation and inquiring about a missed call. The communication is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, addressing Jes Staley and wishing him a good vacation.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, who is inquiring about a missed call.

keyFacts: The email is from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Epstein inquires if he missed a call from Staley.
The email wishes Staley a good vacation.
